name: pouchdb

scripts.build-js: npm run build-main-js && npm run min && npm run build-plugins
scripts.build: npm run version && mkdirp dist && npm run build-js && npm run license
scripts.test-browser: mkdirp dist && npm run build-js && node ./bin/test-browser.js
scripts.dev: npm run version && CLIENT=dev bash bin/run-test.sh
scripts.test: npm run version && npm run jshint && bash bin/run-test.sh
